text:
e="preserve">Pierre Laurent Renoudet (born June 9, 1935), better known as Peter Renaday, is an American actor and voice actor. He was born in New Iberia, Louisiana.
Renaday was known for his roles in ', ', "Antz" (1998), "The Odd Couple II" (1998), "Mulan" (1998), "The Prince of Egypt" (1998), "Ringmaster" (1998), "Scooby-Doo! and the Witch's Ghost" (1999), "The Road to El Dorado" (2000), "Shrek" (2001), "Madagascar" (2005) and "The Princess and the Frog" (2009).
